name: Hold The Galaxy
description:
Description

You, the captain of a small cargo ship, has encountered the Mother Ship of the enemy armada. Will you die with your crew or HOLD until reinforcements arrive?

Controls

   W
A S D -> Move

K (A on Controller) -> Dash

R (Y one Controller) -> Restart

F11 -> Fullscreen

Credits

A Game Made Mostly By Your's Truely, a Really Okey Fruit.
